programme.title: Revenue enhancements and the Nixon files
programme.short_synopsis: What is the difference between a tax and a revenue enhancement?
programme.medium_synopsis: President Bush's proclamation of "no new taxes", the difference between a tax and a revenue enhancement, and the release of President Richard Nixon's secret files.
